entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of rain or drizzle early this morning. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. Wind becoming north 30 late this afternoon. High 9. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
